title: New mockumentary addresses net neutrality
description: The video produced by net neutrality proponents comes while the FCC and Verizon duke it out in court over the same issue this week.
contenttemplated:

There's a net neutrality battle between the FCC and Verizon playing out in a federal court in Washington this week about access to broadband internet. While lawyers make their arguments in that case, net neutrality advocates are pushing a mockumentary on the topic. Susan Crawford, fellow at the Roosevelt Institute and author of "Captive Audience," is featured in the video and joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss.

teaser: The video produced by net neutrality proponents comes while the FCC and Verizon duke it out in court over the same issue this week.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, September 10, 2013
contentencoded:
There's a net neutrality battle between the FCC and Verizon playing out in a federal court in Washington this week about access to broadband internet. While lawyers make their arguments in that case, net neutrality advocates are pushing a mockumentary on the topic. Susan Crawford, fellow at the Roosevelt Institute and author of "Captive Audience," is featured in the video and joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss. 

Click here to watch the documentary, "The Internet Must Go" and click the audio player above to hear the conversation.
